All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Continent
    This class models the Continent, the name, the control value which is the number of armies to be given once a player conquer a continent.
    Country
    This class models a country by giving a name, a continent to belong, a conqueror player id, and the number of armies placed on the country.
    Dice
    A Dice class that is used when ever a player needs to obtain a random generated number between 1 and 6 * @author Arnav Bhardwaj * @author Karan Dhingra * @author Ghalia Elkerdi * @author Sahil Singh Sodhi * @author Cristian Rodriguez * @version 1.0.0
    FortificationPhase
    FortificationPhase to build a comprehensive map of all the possible fortification paths and to allow one fortification move per turn for a player.
    FortificationTest
    FortificationTest class tests the fortification paths retrieval for a given scenario.
    GameData
    This class hold the whole data that is going to be used during the game.
    GameMap
    This class models the game map
    junit4TestSuite  
    MapCreator
    MapCreator implements the logic to make it possible for a user to create map on console.
    MapEditor
    MapEditor implements the logic to make it possible for a user to edit an already loaded map into the game.
    MapLoader
    MapLoader manages the complete map generation operations for the game, in particular it allows user to load the default map, load user's .map file, create map, and edit map.
    MapTest
    MapTest class tests the important aspects of map loader and validator, in particular map connectivity and .map file validation.
    MapValidator
    MapValidator handles the map validation part of the game.
    Player
    This class models the player, it holds the id, the name, and the order to play for the round robin.
    ReinforcementPhase
    ReinforcementPhase allows the player to position the armies in the player's owned countries and to count the reinforcement army based on the number of territories and continents owned.
    ReinforcementTest
    ReinforcementTest class tests the total reinforcement count for two scenarios.
    RiskGameApplication  
    RiskGameDriver
    RiskGameDriver class is used as a view in which the user will interact with a given console.
    StartUpPhase
    StartupPhase includes the logic to set up the game before it starts.
    StartUpPhaseTest
    StartUpPhaseTest class tests the important aspects of start up phase, for instance: player generation, random country assigment to players, the number of initial army based on number of players and generate round robin.
    Turn
    The Turn class is used as a controller which entirely manages the rundown of a given player's turn in the game.
